Elly Woo

wjwj0210@gmail.com

I'm Elly, a full-stack developer and software engineering student who loves creating dynamic and intuitive web applications. I have hands-on experience with Python, React, Flask, and PostgreSQL, and I enjoy solving problems through clean and efficient code. Currently, I’m exploring machine learning and cloud deployment to expand my skill set.

Interests

Apart from being a software engineering student and aspiring developer, I enjoy spending time with friends and staying active. Running is one of my favorite activities, and I often challenge myself with longer distances to improve my endurance.

When indoors, I like playing video games, experimenting with new recipes in the kitchen, and immersing myself in books. I am also a big fan of fantasy movies, which inspire my creativity and imagination.
